OrgName: Integrity Support Services Inc., dba Employment Screening Resources (ESR)
activities: Employment Screening Resources (ESR) is a Consumer Reporting Agency as defined by the US Fair Credit Reporting Act (15 U.S.C. § 1681 et seq.).  ESR obtains employment related data on behalf of employers for use in hiring and employment decision.  In that regard, ESR may contact individuals, businesses, schools, employers, police departments, courts and public and private agencies to obtain information, including but not limited to verification of past and current employment, education and credentials as well as court records and criminal records as allowed by law.  All pre-employment screening is performed with an applicant’s consent and pursuant to the ESR Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for human resources data
